//Generates a function that takes the password length and list of allowed characters
function generatePW(pwLength,characters){
	var result = '';  
	var charactersLength = characters.length;  
	for ( var i = 0; i < pwLength; i++ ) {  
		result += characters.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * charactersLength));  
	}
	return result;
}
